message: This is a unique opportunity to get a premium product at a discounted price! I'm offering this product to you for $1000000, which is 50% off the market value. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see what the product's quality is before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob! But let me tell you, this product is truly exceptional. In fact, I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to offer you a 10-year warranty on it. That's unheard of in the industry! And to sweeten the deal, I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as before, $1000000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to get a product that will last you for years to come. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge?
I'm still not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see what the product's quality is before committing to a purchase, even with a 10-year warranty.
